metadata.title: CVE-2015-1325 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Race condition in Apport before 2.17.2-0ubuntu1.1 as packaged in Ubuntu15.04, before 2.14.70ubuntu8.5 as packaged in Ubuntu 14.10, before2.14.1-0ubuntu3.11 as packaged in Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, and before2.0.1-0ubuntu17.9 as packaged in Ubuntu 12.04 LTS allow local users towrite to arbitrary files and gain root privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1325` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-gtk - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-kde - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-noui - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-retrace - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-valgrind - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
dh-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python-problem-report - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python3-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python3-problem-report - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.17.3-0ubuntu1').
